thread.title: Kelly F

author: Kelly F
title: Kelly F
text: I was in a bind, stuck at work, punctured tyre and a motorway journey to go home... I'd tried the local garages and all were full... I googled tyresonthedrive as a last resort, expecting the prices to be astronomical. How wrong I was! I got a budget tyre, fitting/valves/balance check and disposal as well as a 2hr window booking slot all for less than the cost of the lowest priced tyre at the likes of kwik fit or halfords. The fitter was friendly and arrived early, but asked if it was ok before he turned up! He explained what he was doing and they checked the tread of all the other tyres too. I got a e-receipt and a Â£10 voucher if I recommended them. Which I have to at least 3 people so far! Very happy, efficient service at an excellent price. Definitely the first choice rather than the last resort!
